name: PPPP - Press Press Press to Punch
name_original: PPPP - Press Press Press to Punch
description:
Description

A little - yet funny - 2 local multiplayer combat game.

Smash your keyboard by alternating left and right punches to keep your combo score!

The first player who pushes the KO Cursor in the opponent player side wins!  

Tips

Alternate your left and right punches as quick as possible to keep your combo score growing! One mistake and you loose it. Combo full? Enjoy your special attack, your opponent is defenseless!

Keys

Choose your keys when you start the game! Onces configured, you can auto-load your fight keys by pressing enter on the menu.

Note : Only letter keys are available.

Press esc to return to menu from the Arena, esc once again from the menu to exit the game.

----

Credits

Code and Art by SheepyBullet (Antonin Jacob, myself)

Music by Ectomorphe (Soundcloud)

The project was made in 2 weeks during my free time to help me with the understanding of Unity. I'm publishing it under the name of Wild Box Studio (facebook page), a video game development I've co-funded with Gabriel Jouet (itch.io). Check it out!
